mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_email, member_name, member_password, member_birth, member_gender, member_area) VALUES (#{memberEmail}, #{memberName}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGender}, #{memberArea});
mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(*) = 1, 1, 0) FROM member WHERE member_email = #{memberEmail};

SELECT member_id AS memberId, member_email AS memberEmail, member_name AS memberName, member_password AS memberPassword, member_birth AS memberBirth FROM member WHERE member_email = #{memberEmail} AND member_password = #{memberPassword};
